snippet: The early doodles and boat carvings in his boyhood home in Nyack illustrate how strongly Edward Hopper was influenced by the town’s waterfront.
abstract: Sylviane Gold reviews work of Edward Hopper on view at the Edward Hopper House Art Center in Nyack (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: The early doodles and boat carvings in his boyhood home in Nyack illustrate how strongly Edward Hopper was influenced by the town’s waterfront.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Edward Hopper: Early Nautical Scenes’
headline.main: Long Before ‘Nighthawks,’ a Boy Loved the Hudson
headline.print_headline: Long Before ‘Nighthawks,’ a Boy Loved the Hudson
